snippet: Residents of a village in northwestern China where hundreds of Muslims tried to defend a mosque against demolition have said that many civilians were injured when police attacked.
abstract: Many civilians are injured and at least two are killed by police in town of Hexi, China, after Muslim villagers attempt to stop a mosque from being demolished by government authorities.
lead_paragraph: Residents of a village in northwestern China where hundreds of Muslims tried to defend a mosque against demolition have said that many civilians were injured when police attacked.

headline.main: Violent Clashes Reported in China Over Mosque Demolition
headline.print_headline: China: 2 Deaths Reported in Defense of Mosque
